original_title: UFC on Fox 13: Dos Santos vs. Miocic
overview: UFC on Fox 13: Dos Santos vs. Miocic was a mixed martial arts event held at U.S. Airways Center in Phoenix, Arizona, on December 13, 2014. The fight card was headlined by a heavyweight bout between Junior dos Santos and Stipe Miocic.
title: UFC on Fox 13: Dos Santos vs. Miocic
